headline: FirstEnergy Foundation Energizing the Future of STEM, Electrical Trades
summary: To inspire the next generation of electric industry professionals, the FirstEnergy Foundation is donating $55,000 to New Jersey educational programs focused on electrical trades and science, technology, engineering and mathematics (STEM) programming. The grants are part of more than $5.5 million in community support distributed across FirstEnergy's service area to date in 2025.

thumbnail.caption: JCP&L employees share their experiences with students in OCVTS's electrical trades program.
